progressbar¶

visualization.progressbar(iteration, total, prefix='', suffix='', decimals=1, length=100, fill='#', print_end='')¶

Call in a loop to create terminal progress bar

iterationint

Required. Current iteration

totalint

Required. Total iterations

prefixstring

Prefix string

suffixstring

Suffix string

decimalsint

Positive number of decimals in percent complete

lengthint

Character length of bar

fillstring

Bar fill character

print_endstring

(e.g. “

“, ” “)
